content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"LM People Survey \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-link\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We are constantly working on improving our Account`s processes and initiatives to make Liberty Mutual Account the best place at EPAM, to ensure growing your career in a friendly and fun culture. \\r To make sure we're doing our best we run Quarterly\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" Liberty Mutual People Survey \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"to get your feedback to be certain your voice is heard and your ideas are captured. So we ask our team to share feedback, comments and ideas about work specific on the LM Account.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"That's why we ask our team to share feedback and comments and ideas about work specific on the LM account with the management team trough People Survey. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":147103,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/58eb8f6a-8948-47a1-9d14-7606c8b74470/okjuhu.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/58eb8f6a-8948-47a1-9d14-7606c8b74470/okjuhu.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"okjuhu.PNG\",\"name\":\"okjuhu.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"58eb8f6a-8948-47a1-9d14-7606c8b74470\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1029,\"height\":228.45454545454544},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We are constantly searching for solutions that help to address our team's needs and will be grateful for any suggestions and initiatives that you can address us any time you've got something  - \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/LBTM/Leadership+Groups\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Account DLs \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
